EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_The New Digital Economy for Ireland_Q415.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wednesday, October 21, 2015 The CHQ Building IFSC Custom House Quay Dublin {{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}} Thank you for registering for the upcoming The New Digital Economy Event.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io/event/the-new-digital-economy>. AGENDA
8:00 - 8:30 Registration
8:30 - 8:45 Welcome
8:45 - 10:00 Digital Disruption: The Outlook
10:00 - 11:00 Why Ireland is at the Heart of the New Digital Economy
11:00 - 11:15 Break
11:15 - 12:15 Why Are Digital Disruptors Successful and How Can You Become One?
12:15 - 12:30 Transformation: Make it Happen
12:30 Lunch and Networking VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io/event/the-new-digital-economy>
